T02D3613:236b-1: autstshasma dzam bha la s'a dha nam /
T02D3613:236b-3: khro zhing dgyes pa dzambha la'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3613:236b-4: dpal ldan dzam bha la la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3613:236b-5: thub pa'i gzhon nu thub dbang dge ba yis //
T02D3613:236b-6: phun tshogs mchog gis dpag med rnam par brgyan //
T02D3613:236b-7: gang zhig zhabs la spyan gsum drag po yi //
T02D3613:236b-8: gtsug gi ner bu'i rgyan gyis btud gyur pa //
T02D3613:236b-9: bla med yon tan gnyis med pa'i //
T02D3613:236b-11: rang gi phun tshogs 'gro rnams kyi //
T02D3613:236b-12: rgya chen thob phyir brten par bgyi //
T02D3613:236b-13: de la dang por re zhig bdag gis dpal dzam
T02D3613:236b-14: bha la sgrub las la sogs pa'i rim pa thob
T02D3613:236b-15: nas ; de'i tshe bdag gis yang 'gro ba rnams
T02D3613:236b-16: 'di dang phyi ma'i phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas la
T02D3613:236b-17: dgod par bya'o zhes pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas
T02D3613:236b-18: snying gi nang du bu gnas rjes dbyangs dang bral
T02D3613:236b-19: ba'i aa yig 'od zer dkar po 'phro zhing de
T02D3613:236b-20: las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de la
T02D3613:236b-21: h'um yig dbus nag po phyi'i khor yug cung zad
T02D3613:236b-22: ser po'i 'od zer gyi tshogs mgo'i steng du 'phro
T02D3613:236b-23: nas ; ba'o // de las skyes pa'i rdo rje
T02D3613:236b-24: 'og tu rtse mo bzhi pa steng du rtse lnga
T02D3613:236b-25: pa sbyar ba las rtse mo dgu ste /
T02D3613:236b-26: gsung rab yan lag dgu'i rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D3613:236b-27: gzhan nas steng dang 'og tu rtse mo gcig tu
T02D3613:236b-28: byas nas dbus kyi rtse mo dang dgu zhes so
T02D3613:236b-29: // h'um yig bzhin du kha dog dang bya ba
T02D3613:236b-30: dang tshangs pa'i nang du zla ba la gnas pa'i
T02D3613:236b-31: de dang 'dra ba'i h'um dang ldan pa bsgom par
T02D3613:236b-32: // bya'o // de nas h'um yig dang rdo rje dag las 'od zer 'phros nas /
T02D3613:236b-33: aom aa zhes pa'i sngags brjod pa sngon du 'gro
T02D3613:236b-34: bas phyogs bcu'i sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'i
T02D3613:237a-1: sku dpag tu med pa mar me las mar me
T02D3613:237a-2: gzhan 'byung ba bzhin du 'od zer gyis mdun du
T02D3613:237a-3: bkug nas de'i sku gcig tu bsgoms te /
T02D3613:237a-5: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa nas /
T02D3613:237a-6: tshad med pa'i bar bsgom ste /
T02D3613:237a-7: de'i rjes su yang h'um dang rdo rje'i 'od zer
T02D3613:237a-8: rnams ma lus pa lus kyi nang du bsgoms te
T02D3613:237a-9: / spros pa thams cad dang bral ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la /
T02D3613:237a-10: zla ba dang rdo rje'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams la /
T02D3613:237a-11: aom aa zhes pa 'dis spros te /
T02D3613:237a-12: bkug nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
T02D3613:237a-13: rab tu bcug pa'i mthar skad cig gis zla ba
T02D3613:237a-14: la sogs pa rdzogs pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan
T02D3613:237a-15: 'das dzam bha la gzhon nu lo lnga lon pa
T02D3613:237a-16: lta bu sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i steng du
T02D3613:237a-17: thung zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rin po
T02D3613:237a-19: kha nas rin po che skyug bzhin pa /
T02D3613:237a-20: nor sbyin ser po gan rkyal du nyal ba'i dral bar zhabs g-yas pas mnan pa /
T02D3613:237a-21: rkang pa gnyis kyi steng du zhabs g-yon pas mnan cing /
T02D3613:237a-22: g-yon brkyang gi zhabs su mdzad pa /
T02D3613:237a-23: gcer bu rtags steng du langs pa /
T02D3613:237a-25: thugs kar phyag g-yas pas thod pa khrag gis bkang ba la zhal mngon par gzigs pa /
T02D3613:237a-26: brla g-yon pa'i steng du phyag g-yon pas rin po
T02D3613:237a-27: che'i snye ma skyug bzhin pa'i na gu li kha
T02D3613:237a-28: thur du bstan pa bsnams pa /
T02D3613:237a-29: mi'u thung rna ba ma phug pa /
T02D3613:237a-30: zhal zla ba phyed pa lta bu /
T02D3613:237a-32: spyan gnyis zlum zhing dmar ba /
T02D3613:237a-33: dpral bar khro gnyer bsdus pa /
T02D3613:237a-34: dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D3613:237a-35: sa gnon gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa'i thub pa mi bskyod pa sngon pos dbu brgyan pa /
T02D3613:237a-36: dga' bo sngon po ta ma la lta bus dbu skra bcing pa /
T02D3613:237a-37: 'jog po dmar pos snyan dkris pa /
T02D3613:237a-38: padma chen po padma'i rtsa ba lta bu dkar pos do shal byas pa /
T02D3613:237a-39: du ba'i mdog lta bu mtha' yas kyis mchod phyir thogs mdzad pa /
T02D3613:237a-40: nor rgyas dkar pos ska rags mdzad pa /
T02D3613:237a-41: padma kun da ltar shin tu mdzes pas zhabs gdub byas pa /
T02D3613:237a-42: dung skyong ser pos lag gdub mdzad pa /
T02D3613:237a-43: rigs ldan du ba lta bu khra bos dbu rgyan byas pa /
T02D3613:237a-44: mdog nag cing phyi'i khor yug cung zad ser ba 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phro ba bsams nas /
T02D3613:237a-45: dpral ba dang zhal dang dpung pa g-yas g-yon dang
T02D3613:237b-0: snying @237b ga dang rdo rje'i steng dang brla g-yas
T02D3613:237b-1: g-yon dang zhabs g-yas g-yon dag gi nang du bu
T02D3613:237b-2: gar gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu rnams la
T02D3613:237b-3: / aom dzam bha la dza lendra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3613:237b-4: zhes pa'i yi ge rnams ser zhing 'od zer ser por blta bar bya'o //
T02D3613:237b-5: de'i dus su sna nas rlung 'byung ba'i dus su
T02D3613:237b-6: h'um yig la sogs pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis snying
T02D3613:237b-7: ga'i h'um dang rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams kyis yang
T02D3613:237b-8: phyogs rnams su 'phro zhing reg pa tsam gyis sems
T02D3613:237b-9: can rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi skur bsams te /
T02D3613:237b-10: yang rlung rngub pa'i dus su h'um yig gis rab
T02D3613:237b-11: tu 'jug par bsams nas sems brtan par bya ste
T02D3613:237b-13: 'jig rten gsum na gnas pa'i rin po che sna
T02D3613:237b-14: tshogs pa thams cad klu dang sre mo dang nor
T02D3613:237b-15: sbyin rnams kyi kha ru rab tu gzhug par bya'o
T02D3613:237b-16: // slar yang rlung 'byung ba na klu la sogs
T02D3613:237b-17: pas mid pa'i rin po che rnams mdun du skyug
T02D3613:237b-19: de bzhin du yang dang yang du spro zhing bsdu ba la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D3613:237b-21: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D3613:237b-22: na mo ma ni bha dr'a ya /
T02D3613:237b-23: ma h'a yaksha se na pa ta ye /
T02D3613:237b-24: aom dzam bha la dza lendr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3613:237b-25: zhes pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3613:237b-26: yang na yi ge bcu bkod pa'i sngags so //
T02D3613:237b-27: chu 'bul ba'i dus su lag pa g-yas pa gan
T02D3613:237b-28: rkyal du byas pa'i dbus su bam yig gi 'od
T02D3613:237b-29: zer gyis lag pa bum pa bzang po bzhin du
T02D3613:237b-30: bya'o // lag pa'i rtsa bar aom yig gi 'od
T02D3613:237b-31: zer gyis lag gdub kyi rnam pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D3613:237b-32: bya'o // bam mo // dbus su dzam ngo //
T02D3613:237b-33: mdzub mo dang gung mo dang ming med dang mthe'u chung dang /
T02D3613:237b-34: mtheb chen gyi rtse mo rnams la /
T02D3613:237b-35: bha la dza lendr'a'i yi ge rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D3613:237b-36: aom dang bam yig ni dbus su'o //
T02D3613:237b-37: gang yam yig gi g-yas dang g-yon du sv'a h'a'i yi ge'o //
T02D3613:237b-38: 'di rnams ni aom yig la sogs pa rang rang
T02D3613:237b-39: gi gnas la bu ga rnams su zla ba la
T02D3613:237b-40: gnas pa'i kha dog ser zhing 'od zer ser por
T02D3613:237b-41: bsams nas / lag pa chu dang me tog dang bcas pas kha mngon par phyogs te /
T02D3613:237b-42: aom aindra ni mu kham bhra ma ri sv'a h'a /
T02D3613:237b-43: zhes pa'i sngags lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas /
T02D3613:237b-44: de'i rjes su lag pa brkyang ste sbyin par bya
T02D3613:237b-45: ba'i chu rang gi zhal du zhugs shing dzam yig
T02D3613:238a-0: @238a * // gi 'od zer gyis snying ga'i gnas
T02D3613:238a-1: nas rdo rje h'um yig gi 'od zer gyis yang
T02D3613:238a-2: kha dog ser por byas te /
T02D3613:238a-3: rdo rje'i sgo nas thon tel ga mthil du'o //
T02D3613:238a-4: mdun du skad cig gis bsgoms nas de'i zhal mngon
T02D3613:238a-5: par phyogs pas sku gzugs kyi zhal gyi nang du
T02D3613:238a-7: zhes pa'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad do //
T02D3613:238a-8: ratna tra y'a zhes pa la sogs pas kyang lan bdun dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3613:238a-9: na mo ratna tra y'a zhes pa la sogs pa yang lan cig brjod nas /
T02D3613:238a-10: bu ram dang bsres shing 'bras kyi khur ba la sogs pas gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3613:238a-11: ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du thun mtshams gsum dang
T02D3613:238a-12: yang na thun gcig tu gnas nas bstod pa dang
T02D3613:238a-13: smon lam yang gdab par bya'o //
T02D3613:238a-14: de bsgoms pa'i rjes la bcom ldan 'das aom badzra mu:zhes pas gshegs par bya'o //
T02D3613:238a-15: 'on kyang smin drug dang dbo dang sa ga dang chu stod dang /
T02D3613:238a-16: gzhan yang bzang zhing bzang ba'i nyi ma dge ba la /
T02D3613:238a-17: rdo rje'i dum bu la skad cig gis /
T02D3613:238a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi skur bskyed nas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D3613:238a-20: bzo bo gcig gis nyi ma gcig la dpa' bo'i rim pas sku gzugs bya'o //
T02D3613:238a-21: byas nas kyang bdag nyid kyi rim pa ji lta
T02D3613:238a-22: ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la yi
T02D3613:238a-23: ge rnams dgod pa dang bsgom pa dang chu dbul
T02D3613:238a-24: ba la sogs pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa ni
T02D3613:238a-25: man ngag go // de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D3613:238a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ni rtag tu gnas te bkur sti la sogs pa bya'o zhes so //
